definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:NoxiumPickaxe</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="entity_get_use_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:RawSpectrumite</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CompressedStone</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="return_logic"><value name="return"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
